src:
Foto Bisnis
Dibongkar! Lahan Permukiman di Pasar Gembrong untuk Becakayu
04 Nov 2019, 06:50 by Rengga Sancaya
 Jakarta - Permukiman padat di kawasan Pasar Gembrong, Jakarta, telah rata dengan tanah. Lokasi tersebut akan dijadikan sebagai jalur Tol Becakayu.



Seorang warga mengais puing-puing sisa bongkaran di kawasan Pasar Gembrong.
 



Saat ini bangunan-bangunan yang akan dilintasi jalur Tol Becakayu tersebut telah dibongkar.
 



Sebagian bangunan telah rata dengan tanah.
 



Sejumlah alat berat meratakan lahan yang akan dibangun tol Becakayu.
 



Sisa-sisa bongkaran bangunan masih terlihat menumpuk di lokasi.
 



Pasar Gembrong yang terkenal dengan produk mainan akan terkena dampak pembangunan tol Becakayu.
 



789 bidang tanah di Pasar Gembrong terkena imbas proyek Tol Becakayu.
 



Proyek tol Bekasi-Cawang-Kampung Melayu (Becakayu) ditargetkan beroperasi penuh pada akhir 2019 mendatang.
 



Saat ini, tol dengan nilai investasi Rp 8,54 triliun tersebut baru beroperasi untuk seksi 1A off ramp D.I. Panjaitan 1,8 km dan seksi 1B dan 1C Cipinang-Jakasampurna 8,5 km.
text:
Business Photos
Dismantled! Settlement land in Gembrong Market for Becakayu
Nov 04 2019, 06:50 by Rengga Sancaya
Jakarta - Dense settlements in the Pasar Gembrong area, Jakarta, have been leveled to the ground. The location will be used as the Becakayu Toll Road.



A resident digs for the debris left over in the Gembrong Market area.




At present the buildings that will be crossed by the Becakayu Toll Road have been demolished.




Some buildings have been razed to the ground.




A number of heavy equipment leveled the land to be built Becakayu toll road.




Remnants of the building demolition are still visible piled up on location.




The Gembrong market which is famous for toy products will be affected by the Becakayu toll road construction.




789 parcels of land in the Gembrong Market were affected by the Becakayu Toll Road project.




The Bekasi-Cawang-Kampung Melayu (Becakayu) toll road project is targeted to be fully operational by the end of 2019.




At present, the toll road with an investment of Rp 8.54 trillion has only been operating for section 1A off ramp D.I. Panjaitan 1.8 km and sections 1B and 1C Cipinang-Jakasampurna 8.5 km.
